basics.name: Sergio Leonardo Benítez
basics.label: Full-Stack developer with more than 10 years of experience
basics.phoneTitle: call to Sergio at this number:
basics.summary: +10 years of experience as a web developer, who supports the idea that a good design is the best programming guide. I like to bring the design concept to life through the correct client-side technologies. My duties range from interpreting UI wire frames and translating UX concepts into code to developing user functions, testing web application functionality, and sharing my views on architectural proposals. However, for me, the most important value is being a team worker who is constantly learning and cares about delivering high-quality products.

work.name: adidas
work.summary: Maintainer of a legacy micro frontend platform for trending products at adidas, enabling agnostic implementations of frontend technologies. I supported a product for the customization of adidas sporting goods in more than 6 markets. I implemented functionalities to enable the creation of orders for more than 100 clients with adiclub accounts in the United States. In this same project I maintained 4 legacy REST API services.
highlights: adidas tech summit recognition as speaker.

work.name: Endava
work.summary: I helped implement a web application for intelligent construction management in the United States with a startup in Nashville. I participated with the development of 1 mobile application for the role of construction inspector and to have guarantees about the progress of construction. Internally, I led the functional programming community made up of 12 members, promoting a culture of knowledge transfer and studying the Haskell programming language.
highlights: Lead of the front end community
Lead of the functional programming community

work.name: Prodigious LATAM
work.summary: As a senior developer, I start to support my partners with front-end topics. I led a studio plan to teach front-end technologies to developers with back-end backgrounds. The plan trained 5 full-stack developers for the company. At the same time, I participated in a marketplace for outdoor products implement on Drupal. There, a UX concept based on soft animation was implemented for the client. These new visuals incremented in 30 seconds the user retainable on the web page.
highlights: Acquia award for digital marketing B2C

work.name: Prodigious LATAM
work.summary: In Prodigious I worked on a large automotive project with approximately 800 persons on it distributed globally. Here I collaborated in the implementation of a car configuration and a test drive scheduler built under the web components architecture..

work.name: Las Partes
work.summary: In Las Partes, I worked designing and developing digital solutions for the automotive market. From the design area, I created paper prototypes to evaluate the user interactions. From the developing area, I worked for an e-commerce platform built on PHP with the CodeIgniter.

work.name: Software House Ltda.
work.summary: In Software House I worked developing features for a management school web platform built on Python/Django. Django requires knowledge of the architectural pattern Model Template View for implementing a user interface on computers. Software House was an official sponsor for the Django Bogotá meetup in 2015. There I had the chance to give a keynote about the task management tools for front-end technologies on Django.

education.description: Diploma in Video Game Development and Interactive Books, it is a high-level 120-hour course that will introduce you to the planning, design and development of your video game and the correct way to present the project to clients and investors.

The objective of the undergraduate program is to take advantage of the opportunities offered by information and communication technologies to improve the quality of life, transforming organizations and society through engineers committed to innovation and quality in their professional practice.

The design option aims to bring students from other disciplines basic notations of Product Design and Communication Design, providing basic tools and methodologies in Design, to expand their professional knowledge through exercises to explore and develop their creativity
The visual computing option aims to provide students with knowledge and skills to address the current challenges of applying visual computing in an interdisciplinary environment.

awards.title: Digital Marketing B2C
awards.summary: Winners in the category Excellence in Digital Marketing B2C with the Johnson Outdoors project in the Acquia Engage Awards.

awards.title: Evidence Synthesis Hackathon
awards.summary: I had the chance to participate in the Evidence Synthesis Hackathon with a proposal to update the ROSES Forms tool.

projects.name: adidas Locker Room

projects.name: adidas Hype
projects.description: adidas Hype is a page dedicated to the brand with the. three stripes. It contains news and stories about. adidas, its products and endorsers.

projects.name: built
projects.description: Connect and simplify doing business in real estate.
highlights: 15 of the top 25 U.S. Construcition Lenders

projects.name: Johnson Outdors
projects.description: We want people to get out and experience the great outdoors. We see it as our job to ensure that, from planning to unpacking, it's the best experience possible.
